abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Analyze the input to identify, isolate, and characterize its essential components, attributes, and relationships defining its structure and function.
Evaluate entities against defined criteria or conditions to characterize their properties, behaviors, and roles.
Apply defined operations and transformations to inputs under specified conditions to derive the target output.

subtask_name: multi-criteria candidate selection and select element(s) by conformity evaluation
abstracted_objective: Evaluate a collection of elements against multiple specified criteria, then identify, select, or rank those candidates that conform to or deviate from these criteria.
End of current sequential code flow.
